evidence.claim: Abound emphasizes compliance with HIPAA regulations for health data handling.
The company uses FHIR standards for health data exchange.
Abound is compatible with EDI transaction sets for healthcare.
Integration with EHRs is mentioned in their platform capabilities.
Abound uses cloud services for hosting and processing health data securely.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on EDI integrations suggests interest in X12 transactions.
matched_use_cases: Data exchange between payers and providers
